text: junimkkeseo geudeul-e eunghasa naneun namnyeoleul bulmunhago geudeul-i haeng han eotteohan ildo heosdoeji anhge hal geos-ila neohuineun seolo dongdeunghanila geudeul-ui jib-eul tteonassgeona chubangdanghaessgeo na naui gil-eseo sugohanja seongjeonha yeossgeona salhaedanghan geudeul-eul sogjoehayeo jul geos-imyeo gang-i heuleuneun cheongug-eulo deul-eogage halini igeos-i hananim-eu lobuteo bad-eul bosang-ila geujung joh-eun bosang-eun hananimkke issnola
